__e: Dear friends... and dear girlfriends! Just listen here... and you should listen too.
Please, stop focusing on what you don't have. And focus on the fact that you're here. And you have four dear friends to celebrate with.
Mike's wife is one of my closest friends, and she never said a word.
- I lost the people I loved most and I imagine you miss them too, the people you've left behind.
I lost the people I loved most, and I imagine you miss them too the people you've left behind.
But we all have people we love and we do what we can for them.
- Dear ladies, then that devil Zatopek sped in front and broke a new record.
And now, dear ladies, I had better set forth. I haven't time to be idling around here all day.
But, see, beloved ladies, how pleasant we all are. Huh?
